name: Blaze Casino
description:
This is the first game I made and it's completely free. Now it's in the Beta phase. Your feedback is welcome!

Bring you classic slot machine play, Roulette, Blackjack, Baccarat, Sic Bo and classic games from China.

"Blaze Casino" offers you the chance to win a lot of rewards, choose your favorite game and enjoy the exciting jackpot.
Have fun and enjoy in "Blaze Casino"!

Note: When entering the official release stage, your data will be reset. Please contact the service support email to receive the rewards of Beta participants!

Disclaimer: My game is designed for adults only for entertainment purposes. These games do not offer the chance of "real money gambling" or "winning real money or prizes". Playing social casino gambling or being successful does not mean future "real money gambling" success.
